name: Usagi Kaiju
description:
Use the arrow keys to move around the map. Try to eat what you can, but watch out, you lose time if you try to eat something that's too big!

You must get bigger in size until you can eat everything!

Sounds from https://opengameart.org/content/nes-sounds

Music from https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-ninja

Using rot.js, inkjs and pizzicato.
